pages.title: About
pages.text: Innovative and self-motivated software developer with good problem-solving skills and a strong desire for continuous learning.

pages.title: Work
pages.text: Having worked for a start-up software firm, I have experienced the entire development process from concept to product release, permitting me to interpret and inform the client's vision and to promote end-usability through collaboration and good design.

pages.title: About me
pages.text: Software developer currently based in Edinburgh, Scotland. I passionately believe in bringing clients' visions to life through creative UI, fast websites/apps with great SEO and fantastic user journeys to give the best customer experience.

pages.title: Recent experience
pages.text: I am currently working with a small start-up software consultancy firm based in Edinburgh. I have worked on many different projects where we have delivered fast and effective solutions.

pages.title: My Passions
pages.text: Growing up in the Highlands of Scotland, I was always surrounded by outdoor activities. I became a watersports and alpine skiing instructor which gave me the opportunity to teach all over the Europe. Being back in the UK, I love to play golf and tennis, as well as teaching myself guitar.

pages.title: About my work
pages.text: I enjoy working with forward-thinking people to build interactive and accessible products. Recently, I've worked on projects such as an app to track Lyme disease, 3D e-commerce sites, and an award winning animal welfare app. Through these experiences, I have learned the importance of planning not only in the short term, but in the long term. This allows the entire team to finish projects on time.

pages.title: My approach
pages.text: No two projects are the same and I take a unique approach to each new project I take on. I strive to deliver a product that is as accessible and optimized as possible.
